description: VadderaMatrimony is the exclusive and most trusted matrimony service for Vadderas across the world. VadderaMatrimony App is a part of CommunityMatrimony, which has over 300 top community matrimonial websites including ReddyMatrimony, KammaMatrimony, KapuMatrimony, AryavysyaMatrimony and PadmasaliMatrimony.   Heres what you can do after downloading the Free VadderaMatrimony App:   - Create your profile - Set up your partner preferences based on age, location, education, community etc., - See daily matches on mobile and email  - View profiles and photos of your matches - Search by community, profession, location - Express interest to your prospects - Respond to messages from other members  We have members from major cities in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana and other Indian cities like Hyderabad, Guntur, Chittoor, Anantapur, Nellore, Prakasam, Kurnool, Krishna, Cuddapah, Khammam and etc., besides Vaddera NRIs from USA, Canada, UAE, Malaysia, UK, Saudi Arabia, Germany, Kuwait, Singapore, Australia and Etc.  You can find brides and grooms from different Professions, Educational Backgrounds, Regions & Sub Castes. Our member base of Telugu Vaddera aims to provide you with the best possible match to find the love of your life. Download app today and find your life partner!  A Premium Membership can get you additional benefits like - You can contact your prospects through mobile, SMS, email and chat - You can send personalised messages to members you like - Get Premium Tag and be featured in the premium members section - Get priority position in search results and better response for your profile  CommunityMatrimony, of which VadderaMatrimony is a part, belongs to the Matrimony.com group, the No. 1 matrimony service for Indians worldwide, which pioneered online matchmaking in India 20 years ago. Matrimony.com is a public listed company that owns over 300 of Indias largest matrimony brands including TeluguMatrimony and EliteMatrimony. It has a considerable retail presence with over 130 self-owned retail outlets across India. It also has significant international presence with offices in USA and Dubai. Matrimony.com has over 4 Million active profiles at any point in time.  The Vaddera Matrimony app is designed keeping in mind various partner preferences that a bride or groom might have while choosing their life partner.  Pelli, Maduve, Kalyanam, Vivah, Shaadi or Vyah? VadderaMatrimony helps you find your life partner. Thousands of Vadderas from across Andhra Pradesh & Telangana, India and the world have found their perfect life partner here.  What are you waiting for? Download the Vaddera Matrimony App Now and find your perfect life partner! Register FREE.
